feed.title: Atheos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Atheos:
entry.content: A full release of a ton of bug fixes, cleaner code and some quality of life features.

entry.title: New release for Atheos: Release Notes: v601
entry.content:
Atheos v601 brings a ton of bug fixes, performance improvements, and quality of life enhancements, but this release is mainly to address some recently identified critical security vulnerabilities by @WangYihang. They discovered that an authenticated user could cause a lot of trouble by leveraging some creative path traversal opportunities found throughout several disparate components. This update is highly recommended for all users, but more information can be found in the advisory itself.

What's Changed

  • FIX PHP warnings in CodeGit history by @kabachello in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/246
  • French translation of Atheos by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/250
  • Revamp by @nottisa in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/248
  • Added commit with amend option functionality and various translation by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/251
  • Update index installation documentation by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/253
  • Bug on return_bytes function fixed by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/254
  • Drag n drop's action to upload files by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/255
  • Development by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/256
  • Move files in empty or closed directory by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/259
  • Drag n drop on root directory by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/261
  • Fixed CodeGit parsing return array from CLI where still missing by @kabachello in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/262
  • Fixed codegit log display bug by @coca348 in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/263
  • Fix/file paths and php 8 by @kabachello in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/260
  • Development by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/267
  • Add workflow for automatically building and pushing Docker Images. by @N0tACyb0rg in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/269
  • Fix Docker build. by @N0tACyb0rg in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/270
  • Development by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/271
  • Fixed NaN issue with build because strings aren't numbers by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/272
  • Seach across files now works on Windows by @kabachello in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/276
  • Development by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/285
  • Put context menu fix in the right place by @dr-comeemeememem in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/289
  • Development by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/290
  • Make cryptic bug obvious when worker unable to start by @SimLV in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/293
  • PHP8 basic fixes by @SimLV in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/294
  • Username/Email required for git to work. by @SimLV in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/295
  • Development by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/297
  • Fix/path sanitization vulnerabilities found by WangYihang by @HLSiira in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/298

New Contributors

  • @kabachello made their first contribution in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/246
  • @coca348 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/250
  • @nottisa made their first contribution in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/248
  • @N0tACyb0rg made their first contribution in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/269
  • @dr-comeemeememem made their first contribution in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/289
  • @SimLV made their first contribution in https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/pull/293

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Atheos/Atheos/compare/v5.5.0...v601
